title: How to Make a Tortilla and Salami Sandwich

steps.headline: Get your frying pan ready.
steps.description: Put the pan on the stove and set the heating setting to high.

steps.headline: Add a slice of butter to the pan.
steps.description: It should start melting and sizzling.

steps.headline: Cook the bread until it becomes darker but not burned.
Put the tortilla bread on a plate and turn off the pan.
Set how many pieces of salami on the tortilla bread.
Cut the lettuce and put it over the cheese and salami.
Put in the microwave till cheese melts.

text: Get your frying pan ready. Put the pan on the stove and set the heating setting to high. Add a slice of butter to the pan. It should start melting and sizzling. Add the tortilla bread.  Cook the bread until it becomes darker but not burned.  Put the tortilla bread on a plate and turn off the pan.  Set how many pieces of salami on the tortilla bread.  Sprinkle cheese over the salami.  Cut the lettuce and put it over the cheese and salami.  Fold the sandwich in half.  Put in the microwave till cheese melts.
